alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 24 at 9:03AM MST until January 25 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM MST /MIDNIGHT CST/ THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST /MIDNIGHT CST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Moderate to Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Locally higher amounts are possible. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Kansas and east central Colorado. * WHEN...From 11 PM MST /midnight CST/ this evening to 11 PM MST /midnight CST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A heavy snow band is anticipated to set up with snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour possible. The location of the highest snow amounts will be dependent on where this band sets up.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
